articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Mirabai disappointed as injury ends her Asian Games campaign without medal - Hindustan Times
articles.description: An Asian Games medal is the only silverware missing from the Manipuri's decorated cabinet
articles.content: Ace Indian weightlifter Mirabai Chanu is disappointed that she could not realise her dream of an Asian Games medal as she suffered thigh muscle injury during the women's 49kg event here on Saturday.… [+2000 chars]
